entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:01 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 01:30 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 6:23 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:23 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:23 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
